actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution and Limited Government

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding regulations on the amounts of expenditures of personal funds made by candidates for election for public office.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Allows Congress and the several States to enact laws regulating the amounts of expenditures a candidate for elective public office may make from personal funds of the candidate or members of the candidate's immediate family, including personal loans.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding regulations on the amounts of expenditures of personal funds made by candidates for election for public office.
